main.name: Harmandeep Singh Paul
main.description: A Full Stack Developer who specializes in in JavaScript technologies across the whole stack (NodeJS, Express and React). Experience building complete web applications with backend API Systems.
main.bio: Dynamic and detail-oriented Web Developer with a knack for conceptualizing and delivering elegant, user-friendly solutions effectively and efficiently. Possesses a track record of developing ECommerce web-apps usig RESTful APIs, and a website for a pharmaceautical company. Armed with extensive understanding of end-toend SDLC
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: Fluent in ReactJS and a everlong learner of JavaScript

education.description: Learnt about the foundational knowledge of being a software engineer and prepared for that corporate lifestyle!
High school which taught me to stand my ground amongst the best of the best.
